#summary Alphabetical List of Endpoints and jigg Methods to access them

= Introduction =

This refers to the [http://apidoc.digg.com/CompleteList Alphabetical List of Endpoints] and names the jigg-Method for each. All methods can be found in *de.thesuntoucher.jigg.Jigg*
